item.description:
2009 is a great year! let's celebrate!

This month we will have discussion from 1:30-3:30 pm and potluck party from4-6 pm if you like to stay for Chinese New Year party. Most of guests are vegetarian and some of them have allergy to onion's andgarlic's family. So if you feel comfortable, please check the ingredientswhen you bring the food.

Chinese New year will be on January 26 (Monday). It is the year of ox. For Chinese culture, it is a family-get-together holiday! As you know, my family are all in Taiwan, so I would like to celebrate this special day with you all. Please join me and you are welcome to bring your friends and family! Let's have fun

About this Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: if you can not find it call me at 617-223-7166
item.name: Westborough spirituality January meetup & Chinese New Year party
